p:
Determination of minimum bactericidal concentration (MBC). The MBC was carried out based on the technique developed by Duarte et al.
18 with modifications. From the wells showed inhibition of microorganisms in the MIC test, aliquots of 10.00 μL were collected, transferred to MHA medium, and incubated at 37.00 ˚C for 24 hr and less than five colonies were considered as MBC as they signify kill ratio of over 99.97%. Amikacin (Sigma-Aldrich) in the range of 0.03 - 64.00 μg mL -1 was utilized as a control. In cases where there was no bacterial growth in the culture medium, it can be observed that the tested EOs showed bactericidal effects, but not bacteriostatic ones.
